Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Anton Ivanov
Reviews.Content: The whole package was good, although some things are useless, such as the additional lenses, which do not fit the diameter of the main lens. The memory card holder and cleaning kit. Everytihng else is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great camera but the accessories are weak
Reviews.Author: Bart Hulst
Reviews.Content: The EOS 70D is a great camera, really like the options especially since my previous camera was a 400D.The accessories however are not really useful, I already lost all my data on the memory stick once and lost a few images once more.
